Get the source code
-------------------

The source code for RPC4Django is in the Bazaar_ version controls system
hosted by Launchpad_. It can be branched using the following command:

::

    bzr branch lp:rpc4django

.. _Bazaar: http://bazaar.canonical.com
.. _Launchpad: https://launchpad.net/rpc4django

Reporting bugs
--------------

Bugs should be reported on bugs.launchpad.net_.

.. _bugs.launchpad.net: https://bugs.launchpad.net/rpc4django

.. note:: **Security vulnerabilities**

   If this is a serious security vulnerability, please instead email the
   :ref:`contributors` and give us a chance to fix it before going public.
   
Requesting features
-------------------

Features should be requested on blueprints.launchpad.net_.

.. _blueprints.launchpad.net: https://blueprints.launchpad.net/rpc4django
